title: Sketchbook Folio, "Angels Bearing Symbols of Martyrdom,  Study after Domenichino", 1821–22
medium:
Pen and brown ink, brown wash, over traces of black chalk
Support: white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at center left: Domenichino Bologna; on banderole in upper drawing:PACE PA; at lower left: 30/ Domenichino Bologna 1822
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Upper drawing of two angels and seven putti atop clouds bearing various symbols--wreathes, banner, palm, book, and banderole with inscription. Lower drawing of seven musician angels on clouds with instruments with choir in background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Angels Bearing Symbols of Martyrdom,  Study after Domenichino", 1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brown wash, over traces of black chalk
Support: white heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3573-a,b.
